data.message: Someone is posing as facebook and contacting targeted groups lying and provoking group leaders to click on a link. I did not click on the link but typed into my browser. "Facebook" was spelled incorrectly (faccebook) next to the box to be checked indicating agreement to terms. There were no terms to agree to. BEWARE.

replies.message: I tried to report it but could not find a selection to report them.
Thanks for taking the time to keep Facebook a safe and welcoming environment, Jessie. Please report this content as spam by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2dO9WIS. -Jessica
